itemDesc: An optical instrument used for viewing distant objects.
When attached to a gas mask, this filter provides fresh air to the wearer.
A device used to intercept enemy radio broadcasts transmitted from nearby sources.
Automatically gathers map intel periodically when equipped. The radio backpack is also used to transmit other sensitive information across long distances.
A tool for digging trenches and other entrenched structures.
A tool used to salvage components from remains of old vehicles and equipment.

The Water Bucket is a faction-neutral piece equipment used to put out fires. It is equipped in your 1st equipment slot and used similarly to a grenade. It is one of two objects capable of extinguishing a fire. Similar to other weapons, it starts off without 'ammunition' (aka water), and must be 'reloaded' (aka filling it up with water at bodies of water, Water Wells, or with Water cans in your inventory) in order to be used. The Water Bucket weighs 1.8% when empty, but weighs 60% when filled (regardless of charges).
A multipurpose tool. Can be used to dismantle mines/barbed wire and unlock vehicles.
